body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Eric Rodriguez and I am a customer service representative at AutoMax Dealerships. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Kathleen Sanchez.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Kathleen. Can you please provide me with your contact number so I can assist you further?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my contact number is five five five two three four one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Kathleen. Could you also provide me with your email address for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is kathleensanchez@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing your contact details, Kathleen. How may I assist you today regarding AutoMax Dealerships?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm having a problem with the data management system at your dealership and it's really frustrating.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your frustration, Kathleen. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will work on resolving this issue promptly. Is there anything else you would like to address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you for your assistance, Eric.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Kathleen. If you have any further concerns, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
